moves.1. e4: One of my best games , let´s see. My regular move e5 , because I like it.
moves.3. Bb5 d5: opening and attacking , I wanted to get my queen out - possible if he capture my pawn
moves.4. exd5 Qxd5: here it is , now the bishop is under attack
moves.5. Nc3: great move , defends the bishop and attacks my queen
moves.5... Qe6: I had to go back with my queen
moves.6. O-O h6: h6 , to make it impossible to move the knight to g5
moves.7... Bd7: I didn´t realise it , so I moved Bd7 to defend my knight
moves.8. d3: after this move I expected Bf4 that´s why I moved g5
moves.8... g5 9. Bxc6: I lost my knight no problem - recapture
moves.9... Bxc6: waiting for the next step , White is in a better position in my opinion - king in safe , knights out ,... he is dominating now , so i am waiting ...
moves.10. Nxe5: that´s not a good move for me ...
moves.10... O-O-O: I needed to make O-O-O to get my king out of the e-line because of the rock on e1
moves.11. h3: Honestly , I didn´t know the purpose of this move
moves.12. Bxg5: I need to defend my rock
moves.13... Nxe7 14. Nxc6: good move I don´t have any possibilities , just one to take the knight
moves.14... Qxc6 15. Rxe7: It looks like the white is in a better position , but I have a better chance - checkmate in 2 moves
moves.15... Rhg8: this is the time when I took the lead in the game , white must block the possible checkmate - he has more solutions...
moves.16. f3: Fortunately he did the best move for me...
moves.18. a3: that was not a good move, instead , the white could make a better move
moves.19. g4: the white is forced to move there
moves.19... hxg4 20. fxg4 Qe3: I moved my queen there to take his pawn h3
moves.21. b4: another bad move in my opinion
moves.21... Qxh3+ 22. Kg1: and from here it is easy
moves.22... Rxg4+ 23. Kf2 Rg2+ 24. Ke1 Qh1#: It was a good game , I think the white had more possibilities to win and better positions during the game , but finally I was a bit lucky , but also I defend the attacks successfully and finished it with checkmate. nice play
